Text.Page: With Kamia's help, <PCNAME> killed several cultists, weakening the devan force.

No. There are too many. We need reinforcements.

But I'm worried that if we go back for more troops, the devans and the cultists will scatter, and we'll be back to square one.

What do you think we should do, ?"We can handle this ourselves."

Okay, then. Let's do this!

If we are to succeed, we need to kill Reavers of Resurrection and Ebonheart Sorcerers, as well as their leader...a real beast, named Basenius!

That does it. There are still plenty of these cultists, but without Basenius and his alliance with the devas, they're not much of a threat.

Once again, , you've done Crescentia and Lumbertown an immeasurable service. Thank you.
